text: aye Dawoodh! (alaihissalaam) hum ne tumhe zameen mein qalifa bana diya, tum logo ke darmiyaan haq ke saath faisle karo aur apni nafsaani qaahishaath ki pairvi na karo, warna wo tumhe Allah ki raah se bhatka degi, yaqinan jo log Allah ki raah se bhatak jaate hai, un ke liye saqth azaab hai, is liye ke unhone hisaab ke din ko bhula diya hai
